item.description: with the weather being nice, lets get out and climb. basic stuff you'll need is Harness, Shoes, atc locking biner to belay, now you will also need A piece of rug or mat to stand on / to wipe climbing shoes at this time of year with thawing of the ground it will be muddy during the approach.(you could get some winter rubber slip ons) NOW if you have a rope, webbing for TOP ROPE bring it.
item.name: let's climb Quincy Quarries
